title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: Ballet has released a new Pizza Day version wallet to commemorate the 22nd and its 12th anniversary as the day Lazlo paid 10k BTC for 2 large pizzas.I am offering to do a group buy to reduce overall shipping charges and for those that want just 1 wallet (as these are sold in 2 packs)wallets can be seen/verified herehttps://store.balletcrypto.com/collections/real-series/products/multicurrency-wallet-stealth-pizza-setWallets are $35 for one or $69 for twoÂ  --- Yes, I know they are sold as a 2 pack but for those that do not want two, I will separate them. Those wanting 2 will get a sealed twin pack.payment accepted:BTC bc1ql4wuuxs2ne23fj5pj38p67vfy4m67y4kkvax80cashapp: $MoparMiningLLCpaypal: MoparMiningLLC@gmail.comStrike: strike.me/moparminingllcwill leave this open for a week. so will close: May 27th 5pm EST Please post desired amount as:MoparMiningLLC - 2

Though I did get requests for more to be ordered within an hour of my post above and after already placing the order lol
